name: DOG PLANT
description:
Move the dog with the arrow keys.

Dog has a plant on its back, which needs to be kept watered and fed with sunlight.

Sun and water meters will deplete over time, and they must be topped up!

Rainclouds will water the plant, while sunbeams will keep it happy.

Beware: cats will attract the dog, and fireworks will scare the dog, both altering how the dog behaves.

Bees will slow the dog down, thunder clouds will hurt the plant and clothes being thrown out of the window will also harm the plant!

Make it through the day to pass the stage!

If one of your meters runs down, the game ends!

Exit the game by pressing  ESC

Both .zip and a .exe have been uploaded!

Credits:
* Animation & Music by Dan Root
* Programming by Jeremy Nanhu
